entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 37. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear this evening and after midnight then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 37. Wind chill near minus 50. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 6:05 PM MST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 31. POP 30%
